text: Haroina, sumo ej qavm, ƣajri Allohi jakto ʙutonero meparasted va duruƣhoi ʙuzurg meʙofed. Onhoero, ki ƣajri Allohi jakto meparasted, ʙesak, nametavonand sumoro ruzi dihand. Az Allohi jakto ruzi ʙicued va Uro iʙodat kuned va sipos gued, zero ʙa sui U ʙozgardonida mesaved, pas har jakero ʙar amali kardai xud cazoi munosiʙ medihad
